Name: Punch - Bonus Attack
Desc: Increases the number of Charging Arm: Smash and Shockwave Drive attacks.

Name.Old: Arm Drive - Shock Wave Bonus Attack

Desc.Old: Increases attack count for the shock waves generated by charged Charging Arm: Smash and Shockwave Drive.
Desc.New: Increases the number of Charging Arm: Smash and Shockwave Drive attacks.
